description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the nt os kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43553):

1. Identify the appropriate KB Article based on your system version and apply the corresponding update.
2. Restart your system after applying the updates to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
- The following KB Articles resolve this vulnerability:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
  - Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: [KB5044286](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044286)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system matches the build numbers specified for the updates:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.26100.2033
  - Ensure to backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
